DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether change patient-reported pelvic pain follow pelvic floor injection 200 unit Botox compare 20cc normal saline .
DOC.brief_title: Botulinum Toxin Type A Versus Saline Trigger Point Injections Myofascial Pelvic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : Primary objective : To evaluate change patient-reported pelvic pain follow pelvic floor injection 200 unit Botox compare 20cc normal saline . Secondary objective : To evaluate change patient-reported pelvic pain follow Botox injection conjunction pelvic floor physical therapy compare saline injection physical therapy . Hypothesis We hypothesize woman Botox treatment arm , compare saline arm , great decrease patient-reported pain palpation painful levator ani muscle group two week injection . To test hypothesis measure patient-reported pain palpation levator ani muscle group baseline two week follow injection . Pain assessed 10-point visual analog scale . We compare baseline two-week pain measurement painful muscle group . We hypothesize addition physical therapy , woman Botox treatment arm , compare saline arm , great decrease patient-reported pain palpation painful levator ani muscle group 12 week injection . To test hypothesis measure patient-reported pain palpation levator ani muscle group baseline 12 week follow injection . Pain assessed 10-point visual analog scale . We compare baseline 12-week pain measurement painful muscle group . Intervention : All patient screen eligibility routine office visit . If meet eligibility criterion , offer enrollment . At visit , patient counsel conservative treatment option deal irritative voiding symptom , bowel symptom , pain . The counseling offer standardized patient . After patient consent , undergo initial evaluation pelvic floor physical therapist . Patients return office visit receive treatment . The patient pretreated 100mg topical Lidocaine hydrochloride jelly , 2 % , vagina 15 minute prior injection . A designated medical assistant open opaque seal envelope determine whether patient randomize Botox saline arm . The medical assistant draw appropriate solution—either 20mL saline 200 unit Botox A dilute preservative-free saline , achieve concentration 10 unit per mL . Both Botox saline drawn 2 unlabeled 10mL syrinx order ensure physician remain blinded treatment arm assignment . The saline Botox inject coccygeus , piriformis , obturator internus , puborectalis , iliococcygeus , pubococcygeus muscle bilaterally total 1-2mL per muscle group . Using digital vaginal palpation , muscle inject locate care take locate tender contract point muscle fiber . The index finger use palpation 20-gauge pudendal block needle guide advance target site pierce vaginal mucosa intend muscle group . The needle place intend muscle direct palpation injection 1-2mL aliquot . Study Design : This double-blinded , randomize control trial . Participants randomize either Botox saline ratio 1:1 use computer-generated block randomization . The statistician create sequentially number opaque seal envelope conceal group assignment.Study visit Baseline visit Once determine eligible , patient offer enrollment study . After consent form sign , obtain study data . Participants see physical therapist designate pelvic floor physical therapy center evaluate pelvic floor prior intervention . Injection visit Following pelvic floor physical therapy assessment , participant return urogynecology office injection saline Botox specify . Two-week post-injection visit At two week , patient return outcome assessment . Four-week post-injection visit Patients return 4 week outcome assessment 2 week . After 4-week visit , participant start pelvic floor physical therapy . They go physical therapy total 8 session , do close weekly possible . Twelve-week post-injection visit At 12 week patient return outcome assessment . After outcome data collect , provider patient unblinded . Patients randomized placebo group offer 200 Units Botox injection cost . These 32 patient encourage continue weekly physical therapy 8 week follow Botox injection . We ask participant return 2 week 12 week injection outcome assessment . During visit collect data 2-week 12-week visit .
DOC.criteria: Age great 18 Diagnosis myofascial pain attend urogynecologist Persistent pelvic pain present ≥50 % day past 3 month level 6 great 10point visual analog scale On physical exam , short , tight pelvic floor pain palpation least 6 10point visual analog scale least one muscle group ( coccygeus , pyriformis , obturator internus , iliococcygeus , puborectalis , pubococcygeus ) . Ability read English , provide write , informed consent able willing go pelvic floor physical therapy . Pregnancy breastfeed Any follow preexist neurologic neuromuscular condition precludes Botox injection , myasthenia gravis , bleed disorder ; sensitivity allergy Botox Current use aminoglycosides medication may potentiate neuromuscular weakness could cause concomitant use Botox also ineligible History treatment Botox pelvic floor Presence mass lesion physical exam Pelvic organ prolapse great stage 2 Plan pelvic floor surgery pelvic floor physical therapy treatment next three month Change pain medication usage past 3 month
